name: updateCustomFieldContext
description:
Updates a [ custom field context](https://confluence.atlassian.com/adminjiracloud/what-are-custom-field-contexts-991923859.html).

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:** *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg).

fieldId.description: The ID of the custom field.

CustomFieldContextUpdateDetails.description: Details of a custom field context.

description.description: The description of the custom field context. The maximum length is 255 characters.

name.description: The name of the custom field context. The name must be unique. The maximum length is 255 characters.
